mock_run_command.return_value = '\n'.join(['Username:      testuser',
    'Logged in:     yes'])
keybase = Keybase()
self.assertEqual(keybase.username, 'testuser')
mock_run_command.assert_called_with('status')
mock_run_command.return_value = '\n'.join(['Username:      testuser',
    'Logged in:     no'])
with self.assertRaises(KeybaseException):
    keybase._get_username()
mock.patch('pykblib.keybase.KeybaseAPI.run_command')mock.patch('pykblib.keybase.Keybase.update_team_list')
